subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Radio Shack's discontinuing the radios!
author: ParanormalEarl
full_text:
Having a back ground in electronics i'm very interested in finding out 
if there is a mod to help get rid of the clicking sound in the 12-469 units.
I have heard what the clicking sounds like and not interested in buying 
this unit unless there is a fix for that problem.
so thats why i asked about if there was any fix for the clicking.

Earl..
